description.@en: The Demiurge makes specific demands from Its priesthood. This includes sacrificial offerings, seclusion during the winter solstice for extended prayer and jubilant exhortation during the spring solstice.

effect.@en: When you would normally invoke a Chaos Manifestation, you instead provoke Punishments of the Demiurge. In addition, you are bound by the commandments of your god. You must seek atonement if you violate these commandments.
